synopsis.text:
Will Pikachu and friends create the world's first Pok√©mon performance, filled with enchanting melodies and captivating choreography? As they rehearse their singing, dancing, and individual acts, they discover that Luchabull struggles to carry a tune! With the encouragement of Pikachu and the others, can Luchabull find its rhythm before the grand show?

Join Pikachu, Meowth, Dedenne, and the rest of the gang in this heartwarming short film, accompanying the main feature. Stay tuned for the reveal of the short's title!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
